_header: The boars head that we bring here
_description: A Christmas carol — three quatrains (aaab) with ‘Nowell nowelle’ refrain and 4-line burden: ‘Nowell nowell nowell nowell / Tydynges gode y thyng[ke] to telle’ (repeated)

BLAdd5665.First Lines:
The borys hede that we bryng hereBetokeneth a prince withowte
                    pere…
BLAdd5665.Last Lines:
…In worchyp of hym that thus sprangOf a virgine to redresse
                    all wrongNowell [nowelle]
